message.body: Send me links to the stuff you want for yr b day!
Anything that reaks of urine and comes covered in cat hair
I think I'm at that stage in my life
I'll send ya some links tomorrow :)
Ahahaha. I got the cat hair covered. I just bought a food processor. OLD.
Mine came with my smoothie maker (double old)
Is there something dad needs that I can get him for Father's Day
Not really. I just asked him. Any possibility you could come down for a weekend? We could go out to dinner?
I am gonna try to come by on that Monday. But I know I'll have to see everyone, which is making me apprehensive since I don't think I'll have a car.
Or you can sneak down and sneak home. I can pick you up
Weekends are bad for me this summer. Sucks cause weekdays are bad for hunter.
Just let me know if you need me to do anything. You can stay at mi casa
Kewl! I'll let you know. Might rent a car or something. We were gonna look at land in Asheville that week but our schedules won't line up
